events.message: Customer submitted a report regarding a rear-end collision involving their vehicle on the highway.
Claim categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial details mentioning vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim and assist further.
Customer notified that their claim for the car accident has been acknowledged and is under processing.
Requested customerâ€™s vehicle registration, photos of damage, and police collision report for investigation.
Customer provided all required documents including detailed photos and the official collision police report.
Claim investigation underway to verify accident details and evaluate the extent of the vehicle damage.
Investigation confirmed the collision circumstances as reported and damage assessment is complete.
A settlement amount has been proposed to cover the cost of vehicle repairs and associated expenses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the promptness and fairness of the proposed settlement offer.
Insurance claim formally approved following customer agreement on the settlement amount.
Final payment has been processed and sent to the customer's bank to cover auto repair costs.
Auto accident claim successfully closed after payment issuance and customer confirmation.
All claim documents and correspondence archived securely for future reference and audits.
